Package org.apache.activemq.artemis.core.server.cluster

Class ClusterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.activemq.artemis.core.server.cluster.ClusterManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.activemq.artemis.core.server.ActiveMQComponent
    public class ClusterManager
extends Object
implements org.apache.activemq.artemis.core.server.ActiveMQComponent
    A ClusterManager manages ClusterConnections, BroadcastGroups and Bridges.

    Note that ClusterConnectionBridges extend Bridges but are controlled over through ClusterConnectionImpl. As a node is discovered a new ClusterConnectionBridge is deployed.
